definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你們每天都做家庭作業嗎？

sentences.english: Students are heavily burdened with home assignments.
sentences.chinese: 學生家庭作業負擔過重。

sentences.english: Why didn't you hand in your homework last time?
sentences.chinese: 你上次爲什麼沒交家庭作業。

sentences.english: Just did my homework and practiced the piano.
sentences.chinese: 只是寫家庭作業，練鋼琴。

sentences.english: The teacher bracketed the mistakes in my homework.
sentences.chinese: 老師用括弧標出了我家庭作業中的錯誤。

sentences.english: Lily has already finished his homework, so has Lucy.
sentences.chinese: 同麗莉一樣，露西也完成了她的家庭作業。

sentences.english: He threw his homework aside and watched TV.
sentences.chinese: 他把家庭作業拋到一邊去看電視了。

sentences.english: I ask, is tonight part of his homework for Project Mayhem?
sentences.chinese: 我問，今夜是他大混亂行動上留的家庭作業麼？

sentences.english: Well, you ought to have (finished the home-work).
sentences.chinese: 我的家庭作業還沒有做完。

sentences.english: He usas it for his work, and I can only use it for my homework.
sentences.chinese: 他要用電腦工作，而我只能用它來做我的家庭作業。

sentences.english: We are being given too much homework,so we will take  things up with our teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我們的家庭作業太多，我們要向老師提這個問題。

sentences.english: Recent research state most of children don't have good feeling about homework..
sentences.chinese: 最近的調查顯示相當多的孩子對家庭作業沒什麼好感。

sentences.english: They can study, do their homework and take exams at online schools.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以在網絡學校裏學習，做家庭作業和考試。

sentences.english: The boy does his homework in red ink.
sentences.chinese: 男孩用紅墨水做完家庭作業。

sentences.english: I do my homework at six-thirty,and then I eat breakfast at around seven-thirty.
sentences.chinese: 我六點半做家庭作業，七點半左右喫早餐。
